org.mixare

Class MixState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mixare.MixState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.mixare.lib.MixStateInterface

    public class MixState
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.mixare.lib.MixStateInterface
    This class calculates the bearing and pitch out of the angles, it also saves the state of downloads.
